patthana1.21:1.1_0: Ajjhattaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—ajjhattaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ …pe…

patthana1.21:52.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—ajjhattā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:53.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—bahiddhā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:54.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni …pe…
patthana1.21:54.1_2: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, phalaṁ paccavekkhanti, pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti.
patthana1.21:54.1_7: ajjhatte khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana1.21:54.1_9: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotudhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ viññāṇañcāyatanassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:54.1_13: Ajjhattā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:55.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—paro ajjhattaṁ cakkhuṁ …pe…
patthana1.21:55.1_2: ajjhatte khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati, assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha rāgo uppajjati …pe…
patthana1.21:55.1_4: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana1.21:55.1_7: ajjhattaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ bahiddhā kāyaviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:55.1_8: Ajjhattā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:56.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—paro dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā …pe…
patthana1.21:56.1_1: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, phalaṁ paccavekkhanti …
patthana1.21:56.1_3: Nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:56.1_4: Ariyā pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe …pe…
patthana1.21:56.1_9: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana1.21:56.1_15: bahiddhā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:57.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā nibbānaṁ paccavekkhanti.
patthana1.21:57.1_1: Nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:57.1_6: Dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana1.21:57.1_10: bahiddhā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:58.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.21:58.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā, taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṁ katvā …pe…
patthana1.21:58.1_3: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā …pe…
patthana1.21:58.1_7: ajjhatte khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.21:58.1_8: **Sahajātādhipati**—ajjhattādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:59.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:59.1_3: ajjhatte khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.21:60.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati, sahajātādhipati.
patthana1.21:60.1_1: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—paro dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā, taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni garuṁ katvā …pe…
patthana1.21:60.1_3: ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā …pe…
patthana1.21:60.1_6: Nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:60.1_9: bahiddhā khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati.
patthana1.21:60.1_10: **Sahajātādhipati**—bahiddhādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:61.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:61.1_2: Nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:61.1_5: bahiddhā khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti, abhinandati, taṁ garuṁ katvā rāgo …pe…
patthana1.21:62.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā ajjhattā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ ajjhattānaṁ khandhānaṁ anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:62.1_1: Anulomaṁ gotrabhussa, anulomaṁ vodānassa, gotrabhu maggassa, vodānaṁ maggassa, maggo phalassa, phalaṁ phalassa, anulomaṁ phalasamāpattiyā, nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:63.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:64.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.21:65.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.21:65.1_1: **Pakatūpanissayo**—ajjhattaṁ saddhaṁ upanissāya dānaṁ deti, sīlaṁ samādiyati, uposathakammaṁ …pe…
patthana1.21:65.1_6: samāpattiṁ uppādeti, mānaṁ jappeti, diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhāti.
patthana1.21:65.1_22: patthanāya, kāyikassa sukhassa, kāyikassa dukkhassa, maggassa phalasamāpattiyā upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:66.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.21:66.1_4: senāsanaṁ upanissāya dānaṁ deti, pāṇaṁ hanati …pe…
patthana1.21:67.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, anantarūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.21:68.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo, pakatūpanissayo …pe….
patthana1.21:69.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana1.21:69.1_3: domanassaṁ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, rūpāyatanaṁ cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe…
patthana1.21:70.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:70.1_3: domanassaṁ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana1.21:70.1_5: ajjhattaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ bahiddhā kāyaviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:71.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ.
patthana1.21:71.1_3: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana1.21:72.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:72.1_3: domanassaṁ uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti.
patthana1.21:72.1_5: bahiddhā phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ ajjhattassa kāyaviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:73.1_0: Ajjhatto ca bahiddhā ca dhammā ajjhattassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— **ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ**.
patthana1.21:73.1_1: Bahiddhā rūpāyatanañca ajjhattaṁ cakkhāyatanañca ajjhattassa cakkhuviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.21:73.1_2: bahiddhā phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca ajjhattaṁ kāyāyatanañca ajjhattassa kāyaviññāṇassa …pe…
patthana1.21:73.1_4: bahiddhā phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca ajjhattaṁ vatthu ca ajjhattānaṁ khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:74.1_0: Ajjhatto ca bahiddhā ca dhammā bahiddhā dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo— **ārammaṇapurejātaṁ, vatthupurejātaṁ**.
patthana1.21:74.1_1: Ajjhattaṁ rūpāyatanañca bahiddhā cakkhāyatanañca bahiddhā cakkhuviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.21:74.1_2: ajjhattaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca bahiddhā kāyāyatanañca bahiddhā kāyaviññāṇassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:74.1_4: ajjhattaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca bahiddhā vatthu ca bahiddhā khandhānaṁ purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:75.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—pacchājātā ajjhattā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:76.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—pacchājātā bahiddhā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:77.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā ajjhattā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ ajjhattānaṁ khandhānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:78.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā …pe….
patthana1.21:79.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana1.21:79.1_1: **Sahajātā**—ajjhattā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:79.1_2: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—ajjhattā cetanā vipākānaṁ ajjhattānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:80.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā, nānākkhaṇikā.
patthana1.21:80.1_1: **Sahajātā**—bahiddhā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:80.1_2: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—bahiddhā cetanā vipākānaṁ bahiddhā khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:81.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo …pe….
patthana1.21:82.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—ajjhattā āhārā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:82.1_2: ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhāro ajjhattassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:83.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhāro bahiddhā kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:84.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo (pavattipaṭisandhi) bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro bahiddhā kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:85.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ajjhattassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:86.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammo ca ajjhattassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca ajjhattassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:87.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca bahiddhā kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:88.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo, ajjhattikā indriyā (rūpajīvitindriyampi vitthāretabbaṁ) …
patthana1.21:89.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ.
patthana1.21:90.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.21:90.1_1: **Sahajāto**—ajjhatto eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ …pe…
patthana1.21:90.1_9: vatthuṁ (purejātasadisaṁ), vatthu ajjhattānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:90.1_10: **Pacchājātā**—ajjhattā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:91.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—purejātaṁ, āhāraṁ.
patthana1.21:91.1_3: vipassati, dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, ajjhattaṁ rūpāyatanaṁ …pe…
patthana1.21:91.1_5: Ajjhatto **kabaḷīkāro āhāro** bahiddhā kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:92.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ, pacchājātaṁ, āhāraṁ, indriyaṁ.
patthana1.21:93.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—purejātaṁ, āhāraṁ.
patthana1.21:93.1_3: dibbena cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, bahiddhā rūpāyatanaṁ …pe…
patthana1.21:93.1_5: Bahiddhā **kabaḷīkāro āhāro** ajjhattassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:94.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammo ca ajjhattassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—purejātaṁ, āhāraṁ.
patthana1.21:94.1_1: **Purejātaṁ**—bahiddhā rūpāyatanañca ajjhattaṁ cakkhu ca ajjhattassa cakkhuviññāṇassa …pe…
patthana1.21:94.1_2: bahiddhā phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca ajjhattaṁ kāyāyatanañca ajjhattassa kāyaviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:94.1_4: bahiddhā phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca ajjhattaṁ vatthu ca ajjhattānaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:94.1_5: **Āhāraṁ**—ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca ajjhattassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:95.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—purejātaṁ, āhāraṁ.
patthana1.21:95.1_1: **Purejātaṁ**—ajjhattaṁ rūpāyatanañca bahiddhā cakkhāyatanañca bahiddhā cakkhuviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.21:95.1_2: ajjhattaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca bahiddhā kāyāyatanañca bahiddhā kāyaviññāṇassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:95.1_3: Ajjhattaṁ rūpāyatanañca bahiddhā vatthu ca bahiddhā khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.21:95.1_4: ajjhattaṁ phoṭṭhabbāyatanañca bahiddhā vatthu ca bahiddhā khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:95.1_5: **Āhāraṁ**—ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca bahiddhā kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.21:96.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa natthipaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.21:97.1_0: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā cattāri, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajāte aññamaññe nissaye dve, upanissaye cattāri, purejāte cha, pacchājāte āsevane kamme vipāke dve, āhāre cha, indriye dve, jhāne magge sampayutte vippayutte dve, atthiyā cha, natthiyā dve, vigate dve, avigate cha.
patthana1.21:99.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.21:100.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.21:101.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.21:102.1_0: Bahiddhā dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.21:103.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammo ca ajjhattassa dhammassa purejātaṁ, āhāraṁ.
patthana1.21:104.1_0: Ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammassa purejātaṁ, āhāraṁ.
patthana1.21:105.1_0: Nahetuyā cha, naārammaṇe cha, naadhipatiyā cha (saṅkhittaṁ, sabbattha cha kātabbā), navippayutte cha, noatthiyā cattāri, nonatthiyā cha, novigate cha, noavigate cattāri (evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ)
patthana1.21:107.1_0: Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe dve, naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare naaññamaññe naupanissaye dve (saṅkhittaṁ, sabbattha dve), nasampayutte navippayutte nonatthiyā novigate dve.
patthana1.21:109.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe cattāri, adhipatiyā cattāri (anulomapadāni gaṇetabbāni), avigate cha.
